thread.title: Tour a New Brewery and See Tech's Best Beards (Possibly at the Same Time)
thread.title_full: Tour a New Brewery and See Tech's Best Beards (Possibly at the Same Time)

author: Eric Hal Schwartz
title: Tour a New Brewery and See Tech's Best Beards (Possibly at the Same Time)
text:
share Tour Arlington's new brewery 
It's been a hundred years since Arlington had a new brewery, but New District Brewing Company is breaking that long, thirsty record with a new brewery that will make beer for local restaurants as well as in-house tastings. Take a look at where the magic happens in our tour of the new brewery here . Tech's best beards 
Co-founder of Twitter, Jack Dorsey, is drawing eyes with an impresive new beard, but he's hardly the first big name in tech with a beard that draws eyes. Check out some of the best in Ryan Ferguson's roundup here . Fear the supercookie 
Despite all the problems with tracking your data in a way that's hard to avoid, Verizon is putting its supercookie tech to work in AOL's ad network. It may make advertisers happy, but privacy advocates aren't so thrilled. Learn more about how Verizon knows everything you do online in our story here . GW student entrepreneur's huge success 
Is George Washington University student Max Friedman the next Mark Zuckerberg? Thea 21-year-old student entrepreneur certainly seems to be heading in that direction. Learn more about him in Chris Bing's profile here .
